name: com.theonegamestudio.unity-mcp
displayName: MCP for Unity - The One Game Studio Edition
description:
The One Game Studio's enhanced fork of MCP for Unity. A bridge that connects an LLM to Unity via the MCP (Model Context Protocol) with additional studio features for automation testing, Addressables management, and more.

Original project by Coplay: https://github.com/CoplayDev/unity-mcp
